          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "import {expect}   from 'chai';\nimport sinon      from 'sinon';\nimport proxyquire from 'proxyquire';\n\nlet pingStub = {\n  ping: () => {}\n};\n\nlet pingWrapper = proxyquire('../src/pingWrapper', {\n  './ping': pingStub\n});\n\ndescribe('pingWrapper', () => {\n  let pingSpy;\n  const response = 'some response';\n\n  beforeEach(() => {\n    pingSpy = sinon.stub(pingStub, 'ping').returnsPromise();\n    pingSpy.resolves(response);\n    pingWrapper();\n  });\n\n  afterEach(() => {\n    pingStub.wrapResponse.restore();\n  });\n\n  it('wraps the ping', () => {\n    expect(pingSpy).to.have.been.calledWith(response);\n  });\n});"
              ]
            ]
          },

            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "import {expect}       from 'chai';\nimport sinon          from 'sinon';\nimport proxyquire     from 'proxyquire';\n\nlet formattingStub = {\n  wrapResponse: () => {}\n}\n\nlet ping = proxyquire('../../../src/api/ping', {\n  '../utils/formatting': formattingStub\n});\n\ndescribe('ping', () => {\n  let wrapResponseSpy, pingResult;\n  const response = 'some response';\n\n  beforeEach(() => {\n    wrapResponseSpy = sinon.stub(formattingStub, 'wrapResponse').returns(response);\n    pingResult = ping();\n  })\n\n  afterEach(() => {\n    formattingStub.wrapResponse.restore();\n  })\n\n  it('returns a fullfilled promise', () => {\n    expect(pingResult).to.be.fulfilled;\n  })\n\n  it('eventually returns the correct response', () => {\n    expect(pingResult).to.eventually.equal(response);\n  })\n});"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",

          "version": 1

      "cc9e4711-0562-4ffd-beac-267fa64317ce": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

            "title": [
              ["Proxyquire", [["c"]]],
              [
                " allows us to inject our own stub in the place of the external "
              ],
              ["ResponseProcessor", [["c"]]],
              [". We can then use "],
              ["sinon", [["c"]]],
              [" to spy on that stub’s methods. We use the extensions to "],
              ["chai", [["c"]]],
              [" that "],
              ["chai-as-promised", [["c"]]],
              [" injects to check that the "],
              ["ping()", [["c"]]],
              [" method’s promise is "],
              ["fullfilled", [["c"]]],
              [", and that it "],
              ["eventually", [["c"]]],

          "properties": {
            "title": [
              ["As before, "],
              ["Proxyquire", [["c"]]],
              [
                " allows us to inject our own stub in the place of the external dependency, in this case the "
              ],
              ["ping", [["c"]]],
              [" method we tested previously. We can then use "],
              ["sinon", [["c"]]],
              [" to spy on that stub’s methods and leverage "],
              ["sinon-stub-promise", [["c"]]],
              [" to allow us to "],
              ["returnsPromise", [["c"]]],
              [
                ". This promise can then be resolved or rejected as we wish in the test, in order to test the wrapper’s response to that."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "text",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
